DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine whether regular practice stress reduction program 8 week improve quality life patient malignant brain tumor . Secondary - Determine whether regular practice stress reduction routine decrease perception stress anxiety stress- inflammation-related hormone patient malignant brain tumor primary family caregiver . OUTLINE : This pilot study . Patients caregiver receive 90-minute stress-reduction session week 8 week . Each session comprise educational session stress reduction yoga therapy comprise specific yoga posture , breathe exercise , relaxation meditation . Quality life , stress , anxiety , level stress-related hormone ( cortisol , dehydroepiandrosterone sulfate [ DHEAS ] , melatonin ) assess baseline week 8 . After completion study treatment , patient caregiver follow 6 12 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 14 caregiver/patient pair accrue study .
